mapper.select: SELECT i.* FROM item i JOIN interest inter ON i.item_index = inter.int_item WHERE inter.int_subject = #{accIndex} order by item_index

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.*, s.show_thumb, s.show_img1, s.show_img2, s.show_img3, s.show_img4, s.show_img5 FROM ( SELECT item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, TO_CHAR(item_enrolldate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer, COUNT(repl_index) repl_count FROM item LEFT JOIN reply ON repl_item = item_index GROUP BY item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer ) i LEFT JOIN showcase s ON s.show_item = i.item_index ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND item_category IN
#{category}
AND (item_title LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_content LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_category LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_place LIKE '%${searchValue}%')
ORDER BY item_place

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.*, s.show_thumb, s.show_img1, s.show_img2, s.show_img3, s.show_img4, s.show_img5 FROM ( SELECT item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, TO_CHAR(item_enrolldate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer, COUNT(repl_index) repl_count FROM item LEFT JOIN reply ON repl_item = item_index GROUP BY item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer ) i LEFT JOIN showcase s ON s.show_item = i.item_index ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND item_category IN
#{category}
AND (item_title LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_content LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_category LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_place LIKE '%${searchValue}%')
ORDER BY item_click, item_interest

SELECT i.*, s.show_thumb, s.show_img1, s.show_img2, s.show_img3, s.show_img4, s.show_img5, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY i.item_seller) AS seller_item_count FROM ( SELECT item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, TO_CHAR(item_enrolldate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer, COUNT(repl_index) repl_count FROM item LEFT JOIN reply ON repl_item = item_index GROUP BY item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_status, item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer ) i JOIN account a ON i.item_seller = a.acc_index JOIN showcase s ON i.item_index = s.show_item WHERE 1 = 1
AND item_category IN
#{category}
AND (item_title LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_content LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_category LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR item_place LIKE '%${searchValue}%')
ORDER BY seller_item_count DESC, item_seller, item_index
